sqlMap.select: select ZC_SEQ_BASE.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_PACK.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_PACK_REQ.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_INVITE_CON.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_XUN_JIA.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_XUNJIA_BAOJIA.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_XUNJIA_BAOJIA_DE.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_PRO_MITEM.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_JINGJIA_BAOJIA_DE.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_JINGJIA_BAOJIA_RFQ.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_ENTRUST.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_ASEMP.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_FORMULA_PARAM.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select SEQ_SYS_FRAME_ID.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select ZC_SEQ_BULLITIN_ID.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
select t.EXECUTOR from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO t where t.instance_id in (select e.process_inst_id from $dattr1$ e ) and t.instance_id=$dattr2$
select t.EXECUTOR from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD t where t.instance_id in (select e.process_inst_id from $dattr1$ e ) and t.instance_id=$dattr2$
select SF_SEQ_FA_CARD.NEXTVAL AS ID from DUAL
